Carnage/ Dinobot
(Sorry, the Island is not cloaked to Carnage and her group can see it. 
Sorry, my mistake. Forgive me, please.)

* Carnage sighed as she looked at the massive land mass which floated over 
the sea, so...that was where the signatures were coming from. She sighed and 
looked at Teltoli, it would be no problem for her to get to it, it wouldn't 
be a problem for Cyber Claw either, but her? She was a land crawler, her 
feet were meant to walk on land...not air.
Carnage looked at the Island again, up there was the Maximal base...their 
destination.
She listened to Teltoli's question and sighed again, she had no clue as to 
what she would do after she and the clone scraped Megatron. Maybe wander the 
planet, but for what reason? To explore? Maybe she would pick a side and 
join it, Maximals or Predacons. With Megs out of the way she would be able 
to rejoin the Predacons if she wished.
Carnage spat at the idea, they were her tormenters and they had made her a 
killing machine, why in the Pit would she even consider joining back up with 
them?
She looked at Teltoli and slumped her shoulders...*

" I have no idea what I'll do after I kill Megatron. I guess that we'll see 
when it happens, huh?"

*************************************************************

* Dinobot saw Scourge's missiles heading for him, he saw that he could avoid 
the main mass of charges but not all. He swerved to the side and dodged most 
of them but the last few hit him dead on.
Dinobot snarled as he was forced to take a few steps back but then took his 
ground back and fired at the oncoming Scourge, he hated it when they 
underestimated him.
Dinobot took a quick glance to the left and saw that Tavatron wasn't to far 
away and battling the enemies as well.
He turned his attention back to the charging Scourge, he might have to teach 
this Predacon a lesson in close range combat that he won't soon forget!!*
